suite.name: script_002_DNF Medicinal Product Unit of Use (30450011000036109)

test.name: 01 Some Medicinal Product Unit of Use exist

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active where id in (select sourceid from rf2_cr_transitiveclosuretable where destinationId = 30450011000036109);

test.name: 02 All Medicinal Product Unit of Use are 900000000000073002|Defined or 900000000000074008|Primitive

parameter.name: query

test.name: 03 Medicinal Product Unit of Use is 900000000000073002|Defined

parameter.name: query

test.name: 03 All concepts with semantic tag (medicinal product unit of use) are kinds of 30450011000036109|Medicinal Product Unit of Use

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isActiveConcept_cr(conceptId) and typeId = 900000000000003001 and SUBSTRING(term,-31,31) = '(medicinal product unit of use)' and NOT isKindOf_cr(conceptId,30450011000036109);

test.name: 04 All concepts that are Kinds of 30450011000036109|MPUU (but not 30425011000036101 |trade product unit of use|) have semantic tag (medicinal product unit of use)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId,30450011000036109) and NOT isKindOf_cr(conceptId,30425011000036101) and typeId = 900000000000003001 and SUBSTRING(term,-31,31) != '(medicinal product unit of use)';

test.name: 05 Concept 30450011000036109|MPUU has FSN = 'medicinal product unit of use (medicinal product unit of use)'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where typeId = 900000000000003001 and conceptId = 30450011000036109 and term != BINARY 'medicinal product unit of use (medicinal product unit of use)';

test.name: 06 Concept 30450011000036109|MPUU has SYN = 'medicinal product unit of use' or 'MPUU - medicinal product unit of use'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where typeId = 900000000000013009 and conceptId = 30450011000036109 and term != BINARY 'medicinal product unit of use' and term != BINARY 'MPUU - medicinal product unit of use';

test.name: 07 Concept 30450011000036109|MPUU has SYN = 'medicinal product unit of use' or 'MPUU - medicinal product unit of use'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select get_cr_ADRS_PT(30450011000036109) = BINARY 'medicinal product unit of use';

test.name: 08 has intended active ingredient (700000081000036101) relationships only have sourceId that are kinds of 30497011000036103|Medicinal Product

parameter.name: query

test.name: 09 has intended active ingredient relationships(700000081000036101) only have destinationId 30388011000036105|medicinal substance

parameter.name: query

test.name: 10 Every MPUU has at least 1 has intended active ingredient(700000081000036101) relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active AS C where isKindOf_cr(id,30450011000036109) and id not in (select sourceId from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 700000081000036101);

test.name: 11 has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101) relationships only have sourceId that are kinds of 30450011000036109|MPUU

parameter.name: query

test.name: 12 has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101) relationships only have destinationId 30388011000036105|medicinal substance

parameter.name: query

test.name: 13 Every has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101) relationship IS referenced in the Strength reference set(700000111000036105)

parameter.name: query

test.name: 14 Every has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101) relationship is 'grouped'

parameter.name: query

test.name: 15 Every has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101) relationship grouped with an has intended active ingredient(700000081000036101)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active AS BoSS where typeId = 30364011000036101 and relationshipGroup not in (select relationshipGroup from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active AS IAI where IAI.sourceId = BoSS.sourceId);

test.name: 17 Only [has Australian BoSS (30364011000036101)] always grouped

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where isKindOf_cr(sourceId, 30450011000036109) and relationshipGroup = 0 and typeId = 30364011000036101;

test.name: 17 Only [has intended active ingredient(700000081000036101)] always grouped

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where isKindOf_cr(sourceId, 30450011000036109) and relationshipGroup = 0 and typeId = 700000081000036101;

test.name: 17 Only [has unit of use(30548011000036101)] always grouped

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where isKindOf_cr(sourceId, 30450011000036109) and relationshipGroup = 0 and typeId = 30548011000036101;

test.name: 18 has manufactured dose form (30523011000036108) relationships only have sourceId that are kinds of 30450011000036109|MPUU

parameter.name: query

test.name: 19 has manufactured dose form relationships(30523011000036108) only have destinationId 30383011000036100|form

parameter.name: query

test.name: 20 Every MPUU has at least 1 has manufactured dose form(30523011000036108) relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active AS C where id not in (select sourceId from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30523011000036108) and isKindOf_cr(id,30450011000036109);

test.name: 21 Every MPUU has Exactly 1 has manufactured dose form(30523011000036108) relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30523011000036108 group by sourceId having count(typeId) != 1;

test.name: 21 has manufactured dose form(30523011000036108) relationship never grouped

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where isKindOf_cr(sourceId, 30450011000036109) and relationshipGroup != 0 and typeId = 30523011000036108;

test.name: 22 has unit of use (30548011000036101) relationships only have sourceId that are kinds of 30450011000036109|MPUU

parameter.name: query

test.name: 23 has unit of use relationships(30548011000036101) only have destinationId 700000011000036109|unit of use

parameter.name: query

test.name: 24 Every Kind of MPUU has at least 1 has unit of use(30548011000036101) relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active AS C where isKindOf_cr(id,30450011000036109) and id not in (select sourceId from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30548011000036101);

test.name: 25 Every MPUU has Exactly 1 has unit of use(30548011000036101) relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30548011000036101 group by sourceId having count(typeId) != 1;

test.name: 26 Every has unit of use(30548011000036101) relationship IS referenced in the Unit of use size reference set(700000141000036106) - Except 30450011000036109|MPUU

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where typeId = 30548011000036101 and sourceId not in (30450011000036109,30425011000036101) and id not in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ccsrefset_active where refsetId = 700000141000036106);

test.name: 27 ALL Medicinal Product Unit of Use descendants only have [700000081000036101|has intended active ingredient] OR [116680003|Is a] OR [30364011000036101|has Australian BoSS] OR [30523011000036108|has manufactured dose form] OR [30548011000036101|has unit of use] relationships

parameter.name: query
